Aug 2009

Vinyl

LP, Blue Translucent with Yellow Splatter

Notes

500 pressed, all on the same color combination of one blue with yellow splatter record and one gold with pink splatter record. Issued in gatefold sleeve with accompanying booklet. Also pressed as a CD, limited to 500 in standard jewel cases.
